entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 24. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 24. Wind chill minus 40 this morning and minus 32 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Sunday 05 March 2023
